mapper.select: select rental.rental_code as rentalCode, book.book_name as bookName, member.member_name as memberName, memberlevel.payment as memberlevelPayment, rental.rental_prepayment as rentalPrePayment, rental.rental_start as rentalStart from rental join book on rental.book_code = book.book_code join member on rental.member_id = member.member_id join memberlevel on member.memberlevel_code = memberlevel.memberlevel_code where rental.book_code = #{bookCode}
select state_code from book where book_code = #{bookCode}
select member_id as memberId from member where member_id= #{memberId}
